channel.title: Invador zim type user titles!

item.title: Invador zim type user titles!
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

On my server I use invador zim cinnda user titles!

find this in client.java:

			if (playerId == -1) {

2 spaces above that put this!

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // // Invador Zim status's // // // //////////////////////owners///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("tall skinny green guy") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("motherload11") ) { status = "operation EARTH DOOM leader";} /////////////////////coders////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("diablo1123") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Invador Tak") ) { status = "Coder of the invasion";} ////////////////////admins/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("silabsoft") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("motherload11") ) { status = "Tall green dude";} ////////////////////mods///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("joe_durt") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("filthy earth human") ) { status = "Invador guard!";}else{ status = "";} ///////////////////End New Rights////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
and there ya go!

WOOPS i forgot this part:

replace the ::players command with this:

if (command.startsWith("players")) { setLine("@dre@Players Online", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); String puserTitle = "player"; int questRow = 8145; for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null") { puserTitle = "player"; if(person.playerRights == 1) puserTitle = "Mod"; if(person.playerRights == 2) puserTitle = "Admin"; if(person.playerRights == 3) puserTitle = "Owner"; setLine("@dre@"+puserTitle+" "+person.playerName+" @dbl@ at("+person.absX+","+person.absY+")", questRow); questRow++; } } } questRow++; setLine("", questRow); questRow++; setLine("", questRow); setLine("@dre@Players Online", 8144); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
